link.script:
$(function() {
	addFramesetTranslate();
});

function addFramesetTranslate(){
    var pageURL = window.location.href;
    pageURL = encodeURIComponent(pageURL);
    var translateDropdown = '
' +
                                '
Translate this page...' +
                                '
' +
                                    '
Translate this page...' +
                                    '' +
                                        '
' +
                                            'English to Spanish' +
                                        '' +
                                        '
' +
                                            'English to Arabic' +
                                        '' +
                                        '
' +
                                            'English to Chinese (Simplified)' +
                                        '' +
                                        '
' +
                                            'English to Chinese (Traditional)' +
                                        '' +
                                        '
' +
                                            'English to French' +
                                        '' +
                                        '
' +
                                            'English to German' +
                                        '' +
                                        '
' +
                                            'English to Italian' +
                                        '' +
                                        '
' +
                                            'English to Japanese' +
                                        '' +
                                        '
' +
                                            'English to Korean' +
                                        '' +
                                        '
' +
                                            'English to Portuguese' +
                                        '' +
                                        '
' +
                                            'English to Russian' +
                                        '' +
                                        '
' +
                                            'English to Vietnamese' +
                                        '' +
                                    '' +
                                '' +
                                '
' +
                            '';
    var pageHost = window.location.host;
    if(pageHost != 'translate.googleusercontent.com')
    {				
        $('#sw-mystart-left').append(translateDropdown);
        $('.sw-mystart-dropdown.translate').click(function()
        {
            $('.sw-dropdown',this).show();
        });
        $('.sw-mystart-dropdown.translate').hover(function()
        {
        },
        function()
        {
            $('.sw-dropdown',this).hide();
        });
    }
		
}

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: update from superintendent

strong.em: Check the links below for updates and helpful information.

ClickAbove or Below for School Videos
Important Messages for our Students!

span.a: he 5 WCSD sites for breakfastand lunch pickup are open Monday only.
Sites established in partnership with CAPC will be open M-F for breakfast and lunch pickup.

em.span: This is subject to change. Additional detailsmay be found by clicking on the image below.
Special thanks to CAPC, First Student and our volunteers!

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: free lunch breakfast

strong.a: Click here for an important update from the North Country Family Health CentersSchool-Based Health Center

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: health wellness clinic

span.span:
School Budget Vote and BoE Petitions have been
postponed, until at least June 1, 2020, per Governor Cuomo.

br.span:
We are awaiting further information from the
New York State Education Department.
Petitions will be made available when we are given further directive.
